mapper.update:
UPDATE page_tab
page_tab_name = #{pageTabName},
page_tab_remark = #{pageTabRemark},
page_tab_sort = #{pageTabSort},
is_home_page = #{isHomePage},
page_tab_status = #{pageTabStatus},
web_template_id = #{webTemplateId},
company_id = #{companyId},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
